title: Grove Docgen Configuration
description: Configuration schema for grove-docgen documentation generation

temperature.description: Controls randomness in generation. Lower values (0.0-0.5) make output more focused and deterministic. Higher values (0.5-1.0) make output more creative and varied.

top_p.description: Nucleus sampling threshold. The model considers tokens until their cumulative probability reaches this value. Lower values make output more focused.

top_k.description: Limits the model to consider only the top K most likely tokens at each step. Lower values make output more predictable.

max_output_tokens.description: Maximum number of tokens to generate. Use this to control documentation length. Typical values: 2048 (concise), 4096 (standard), 8192 (detailed).

enabled.description: Whether documentation generation is enabled for this package

title.description: The display title for this package's documentation

description.description: A brief description of the package

model.description: The LLM model to use for generation

regeneration_mode.description: How to handle existing documentation during regeneration
enumDescriptions: scratch: Generate fresh documentation without considering existing content
reference: Include existing documentation as context for improvements

rules_file.description: Path to a custom .grove/rules file for documentation-specific context gathering (relative to docs/)

structured_output_file.description: Path to generate structured JSON output for programmatic access (e.g., MCP integration)

system_prompt.description: System prompt to prepend to all section prompts. Use 'default' for built-in tone guidelines or specify a custom prompt file path

prompt.description: Path to the prompt file for this section (relative to docs/)

output.description: Output filename for the generated markdown

json_key.description: Optional key for structured JSON output. Used when generating JSON from markdown

model.description: Model override for this specific section. If not specified, uses the global model setting.

temperature.description: Temperature override for this section. Lower for more deterministic output.

max_output_tokens.description: Maximum output tokens override for this section. Use larger values for detailed sections like API references.

readme.description: Configuration for synchronizing the project README.md from documentation.

template.description: Path to the README template file (relative to package root).

output.description: Path to the output README file (relative to package root).

source_section.description: The 'name' of the documentation section to inject into the template.

strip_lines.description: Number of lines to strip from the top of the source documentation file before injection. Useful for removing headings, blank lines, or metadata.

examples.title: My Library
examples.description: A powerful Go library for testing
